column1: labels###0###Value of labels used to create masks
inverted###0###inversion of the image (sometimes necessary depending on Fiji version for example)
anisotropy###4###Is multiplied by Z_downsampling to get final Z anisotropy
path_bary###./barys.csv###Path to barycenter csv file containing "x
column4: t" coordinates for each timepoint on each line; if file not found will use median point across all XYZT
